job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
job.description:
Optomi in partnership with a major sports association who is looking for a junior level Full Stack Developer. This association is looking for someone eager and willing to have all hands on deck. The ideal candidate will work well in a collaborative environment and obtain great communications skills. Join a team of proud, passionate, and caring people that together share their diverse talents and backgrounds to serve the members of the association.
Must Have Skills/ Requirements:
Bachelor’s Degree (B.S.) in Computer Programming, Computer Science or related field.
2+ years experience.
Full stack development experience.
Has worked with Ruby on Rails.
Test driven development.
Web frameworks.
What The Candidate Will Enjoy:
Working for a major sports association to design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software!
Managing individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables!
Helping build a world-class team and cultivate innovation!
Leading designs of major software components, systems, and features!
Mentoring and training other team members on new technologies, design techniques, and coding standards!
